title: Nontuberculous Mycobacterial (NTM) Lung Disease
description: A Study to Evaluate ALIS (Amikacin Liposome Inhalation Suspension) in Participants With Nontuberculous Mycobacterial Lung Infection Caused by Mycobacterium Avium Complex

title: Chronic Rhinosinusitis without Nasal Polyps (CRSsNP)
description: A Study of the Efficacy and Safety of Brensocatib in Participants With Chronic Rhinosinusitis Without Nasal Polyps (CRSsNP)
criteria: Scheduled sinus surgery during study at any time

title: Hidradenitis Suppurativa (HS)
description: A Study of the Efficacy and Safety of Brensocatib in Adults With Moderate to Severe Hidradenitis Suppurativa (HS)
criteria: Diagnosis of moderate to severe Hidradenitis Suppurativa (HS) for at least 6 months
HS lesions in at least 2 distinct anatomic areas

title: Pulmonary Arterial Hypertension (PAH)
description: A Study to Evaluate the Efficacy, Safety and Pharmacokinetics of Treprostinil Palmitil Inhalation Powder in Participants With Pulmonary Arterial Hypertension
criteria: Diagnosis of PAH for at least 3 months

title: Duchenne Muscular Dystrophy (DMD)
description: A Study to Investigate the Safety and Biodistribution of a Single Intrathecal (IT) Injection of INS1201 in Ambulatory Males With Duchenne Muscular Dystrophy (DMD)
